i tink i saw kyoko today. tsk.. so disappointed wif myself. how come i still cannot overcome it huh? this famous quote from a OD author made me believe in it ever more..'maybe it's really something magical abt being the 1st crush... she's ideal, almost perfect, untouchable... cos i'm just this nobody attracted to her... when so many other better looking, fitter, richer, wittier guys are after her. who am i? i am no musician, no entertainer, no model, no perfect gentleman... who am i to seek someone so ideal?' she has this uncanny ability dat make me distracted. first it was prelim, den came 'o' level. i could not and did not study for the a maths paper 2 and physics. she gave me probably the most distraught xmas i have ever past. i was determine to forget abt her on the birthday when she did not reply abt the gift. or maybe she din noe? or maybe she din receive? haix.. i have alot habits dat cannot change.. i will always to choose to walk the long way around the coffeeshop.. round the shops.. den back home. i will always to at her window whenever i pass .. but the optimism never came close to helping me. i should end off any lingering hope now.. no point being distracted to her.

from far, everything looks good. almost fantasy, almost dream-like. Perfect, because most of what we make of it was made up by us, by our own mind, by our own ideals. we added the touches of perfection shaped by our ideals to the otherwise blurred image.
